usage_notes.explanation: This is a Latin word, rarely used in modern English except in academic or historical contexts. It refers to unrestrained or excessive sexual desire, or to a playful, frolicsome manner.

derivatives: lascivious (English adjective derived from Latin lascivus)

level_frequency.frequency_google_ngram: Very low frequency in modern English.

readability_explanation.text: This is a Latin word and not part of common English vocabulary. Understanding requires knowledge of Latin or specialized vocabulary related to literature or history.
